description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Classic Twin-Stick Shooter. Single and Online Multiplayer Battles in a retro style.  The Earth is under attack from an invisible enemy. In a microscopic world beneath the nature we can perceive, a battle rages for supremacy.  If you can handle the pressure then you must join the fight.  Update 2 fixes some bugs and makes Space Piranha a lot easier.
description.short: Classic Twin-Stick Shooter. Single and Online Multiplayer Battles in a retro style.  The Earth is under attack from an invisible enemy. In a microscopic world beneath the nature we can perceive, a battle rages for supremacy.  If you can handle the pressure then you must join the fight.  Update 2 fixes some bugs and makes Space Piranha a lot easier.
